p: One of the largest case series on the correlation of chest CT and RT-PCR in COVID-19 is available from the epicenter of the outbreak in Wuhan [ 4]. The 1014 patients were assigned into three groups: The first two groups consisted of patients having typical clinical symptoms and positive chest CT with or without typical dynamic changes (81%). In the third group (19%), the patients had only one positive CT scan and presumably clinical symptoms (Table 1).
